item.title: Abandoned Lime bike, 7th November
item.description:
This bike is propped up against the fence of 138 Pasteur Gardens N18 when there is a special place for them to be left, right next to it! Yesterday there was a bike in the correct place so someone may have moved it or it may be a different bike???

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Pasteur Gardens, Bowes, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Rubbish, 7th November
item.description:
I reported this problem in College Road particularly, the rubbish is a lot everyday. I have asked for a bin to be put at the bus stop which could help with this problem… The road and pavements are cleaned very occasionally when the web site says weekly!!!! I am so frustrated as our Council Tax is not cheap and the pavements or curbs are never swept. Dogs mess has also been a problem . I have to look at the rubbish every day out my windows and this is not good enough. Please can this problem get taken care of asap. This problem is constant and you will see I have reported the problem several times.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): College Road, Plaistow, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Litter and rubbish, 7th November
item.description:

item.title: Inconsiderate parking, 7th November
item.description:
This truck is frequently parked in Chequers Way N13 6DA near jct. with Pasteur Gardens making it difficult for traffic driving into/out of the road because it obscures the view & makes the usable road so narrow. As you can see there is also a tyre propped up against it.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Chequers Way, Bowes, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Wheelie bins left in road to save parking spaces, 7th November
item.description:
The residents of 6 Eaglesfield Road have, for many months, used their wheelie bins to protect parking spaces. I think this practice is dangerous, and contravenes the Road Traffic Act. Number 43 Eaglesfield Road also uses the same tactic. Please advise the residents accordingly.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Eaglesfield Road, Shooters Hill, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Witnessed fly tipping at junction of Erith Rd/Upper Park Road, 7th November
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Erith Road, Lessness Heath, London
